trans-unit.source: Provides methods for a subscription service to manage subscriptions for a workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce metodi per consentire a un servizio di sottoscrizione di gestire sottoscrizioni per un runtime del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService> is the base class for any subscription service classes used in the Workflow Foundation (WF).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService> è la classe di base per tutte le classi del servizio di sottoscrizione utilizzate in Workflow Foundation (WF).

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService.CreateSubscription(System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService.DeleteSubscription(System.Guid)" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando si eredita da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" />, è necessario eseguire l'override dei seguenti membri: <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService.CreateSubscription(System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService.DeleteSubscription(System.Guid)" />.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription" /> that the workflow runtime created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription" /> che è stata creata dal runtime del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> that the workflow runtime created the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposta a override in una classe derivata, notifica <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> che il runtime del flusso di lavoro ha creato la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription" /> specificata.

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the subscription that the workflow runtime deleted.
trans-unit.target: GUID della sottoscrizione eliminata dal runtime del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> that the workflow runtime deleted the subscription associated with the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposta a override in una classe derivata, notifica <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowSubscriptionService" /> che il runtime del flusso di lavoro ha eliminato la sottoscrizione associata al GUID specificato.
